Headline: #94 South California Temporary Reroute at California/Cermak
ShortDescription: #94 South California buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via California, Marshall Boulevard, Cermak, then resume their normal route on California.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#94 South California buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via California, Marshall Boulevard, Cermak, then resume their normal route on California.

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?
Buses are rerouted due to street blockage near California/Cermak.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Howard
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Howard due to a mechanical problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Purple and Yellow Line trains are standing at Howard due to a mechanical problem.

At this time, also consider other alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. 

This may include:
#151 Sheridan
#22 Clark
#97 Skokie
#147 Outer Drive Express

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
